div.p: >>> HI, I’M BILL O’REILLY. THANKS FOR WATCHING US

THE MUSLIM STUFF, THE BIRTH CERTIFICATE.

THEM AND THE COUNTRY. SOME ON THE RIGHT EVEN SAY
IS HE DOING IT INTENTIONALLY.

AND THE RUNUP TO PRESIDENT KENNEDY’S ASSASSINATION.

AM. >> BEING FRUSTRATED IS NOT

IT’S. HARDER WHEN YOU SEE SOMEBODY

>> BUT, AGAIN, PRESIDENT OBAMA DOES TAKE IT
